nodes.text: Star Wars Bust Collection 1 is the first issue of the Star Wars Bust Collection magazine published in Spain by De Agostini on January 23, 2018. The issue came alongside a bust of Darth Vader. The issue would later be released in the United Kingdom in December 2020.

In France, the first issue would feature the stormtrooper and come alongside a stormtrooper bust. In Spain, the stormtrooper would be featured in the third issue. In the United Kingdom, the stormtrooper would be featured in the second issue.
